          <title>
            <string language="en">Measuring G using Cavendish method</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messender G mit Cavendish Methode</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">G de mesure en utilisant la méthode de 
Cavendish</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">G de medição usando o método de Cavendish</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">G di misurazione usando metodo di Cavendish</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέτρηση του γ που χρησιμοποιεί τη μέθοδο Cavendish</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">G que mide usando el método de Cavendish</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an experimental set-up used by Cavendish to measure the gravitational constant G using four lead spheres.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravitational constant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lead spheres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rods</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">suspension fibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine experimentelle 
Installation, die von Cavendish verwendet wird, um die 
Gravitationskonstante G mit vier Leitung Bereichen zu messen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une installation 
expérimentale employée par Cavendish pour mesurer la constante de la
gravité G en utilisant quatre sphères de fil de sortie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma instalação 
experimental usada por Cavendish medir a constante gravitacional G 
usando quatro esferas da ligação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una messa a punto 
sperimentale usata da Cavendish per misurare il costante 
gravitazionale G usando quattro sfere del cavo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει πειραματική οργάνωση που 
χρησιμοποιείται από Cavendish για να μετρήσει το βαρύτητας 
σταθερό γ χρησιμοποιώντας τέσσερις σφαίρες μολύβδου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una disposición 
experimental usada por Cavendish para medir la constante gravitacional
G usando cuatro esferas del terminal de componente.</string>
          </description>
